content.summary: Moving bright green sphere treetop high down fairway on golf course with hesitation
Extrano artefacto
Estrella o que sera?
Acontesimientos de enero
2 triangle shaped objects glowing softly with no other illumination shot across the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Twice i have seem orbs in the night sky once about 3 years ago. the lights were moving and zipping around each other, as if they were playing a game. all of a sudden they formed a triangle. in that triangle appeared to be engerized with electrity or something. then they disappeared.

the second time was 1 month ago. we were coming home from an appointment. it was dark allready approximally 7:30. i kept seeing these funny looking lights, real bright white. very odd glow. we would traven a few miles and them would be ahead of us then behind us. as if they were looking for something. we were on a straight road by the way. they finially disappeared. after being at home for a while, i decided i would look out at the sky. to my amazement the lights,closer now were in the sky toward the west, the direction that we had come from. i stood on my porch and watched to see if they were planes or what. the lights all moved together. they did not move straight, but were as if a large triangle in the sky turning around. if indeed this was a solid object i would say it would have been 100x100x100 feet, very large.
ps i am a person that watches the skies, and i have seen many things that i can't explain from what seemed to be a shooting star, that stopped and went back out in space, to what looked like a enormous red flare pass over my house.
content.summary: Triangle turned around very bright white light funny looking glow

content.detailedDescription: i played pop warner football when i was a kid, for about 5 years. i was on a team called the knightdale knights, and we practiced and played in the same field, very close to knightdale elementary school in knightdale, n.C. i was about 11 years old when this event took place. after practice one night, as we were walking to our car, i looked up across the street and over a nearby playground, and saw something that my mind could barely comprehend. it looked exactly like a carnival or fair ferris wheel had somehow managed to come off of its track and fly through the air... but this i knew was physically impossible, and that even if it were reasonable, there was no carnival or fair nearby. i studied the object for about 10 minutes, but i'm sure it was in the air for a much longer period of time. it just hung in the air, stationary in its position, but seemingly spinning. it made no sound. it had lights around the edges of it, blinking on and off and in different colors- blue, yellow, amber, even green. the lights were probably what made me think of it as a ferris wheel. they blinked around the external area of the... (craft?) and like i mentioned earlier, it seemed to be spinning. i don't know if i told anyone about this then, or if anyone else noticed it when it occurred, but it's really the only time i've seen anything strange in the skies that couldn't be explained. i know what man-made aircraft look like, flares, meteors, comets, "falling stars," and this was definitely not something that resembled any of those things. i didn't believe in "ufo's" or "aliens" or anything of the sort then either... i was just a kid. but i did see something unidentified and flying, and it was definitely an object. to all those that have seen strange things in the sky, well, the universe is huge. for there to be only one planet in the entirety of the cosmos that houses living organisms... that's just a little absurd to me, and the biggest waste of space imaginable. thank you everyone for your time.
content.summary: Ferris wheel in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Last night i saw a glowing ball above an abandoned car on 195 west. when i got within 1/4 mile of it, the ball flew up into the sky. when i came back with a state cop, the car was gone too.
content.summary: Ball over empty vehicle

content.detailedDescription: Last night i saw a glowing ball above an abandoned car on 195 west. when i got within 1/4 mile of it, the ball flew up into the sky. when i came back with a state cop, the car was gone too.
content.summary: Ball over empty vehicle

content.detailedDescription: I saw a light in the evening sky in the 50's. i was just a teenager at the time. it appeared silently over clifton, nj about 10 pm. it slowly went northwest from the direction of newark to patterson, nj. the altitude was approximately 1000-2000 feet above the ground. upon observing it, i stopped.The ufo also stopped. after about 10-15 seconds, an orange glow appeared behind it, and silently it zoomed to the north east. estimated speed: 300-500 mph. i recall it appearing like a "flying light bulb". it has a frosted light bulb shape and when the orange tail appeared, it resembled a light bulb. since the sighting, i served in the army, graduated college with a degree in chemistry and have a private pilot license. this is also my second ufo sighting. i regard my experiences are bonefide. seeing is believing. . .
content.summary: Moving light in early evening sky

content.detailedDescription: Walking the dogs this morning and noticed a bright light in the sky. it was like an headlight/searchlight from an helicopter. the object was brighter than venus and much bigger. no noise and seemed to wobble slightly. it travelled south east and flew directly over head. the shape and intensity didn't change. there were no flashing lights. watched the object for about 5 mins. after flying over head it appeared to speed up and then entered some clouds which seemed very high and never reappeared.
content.summary: Large brighte headlight in the sky that wobbled, increased in speed,

content.detailedDescription:
I was invited by a friend (the pilot) to make this short flight. he rented a small plane to accrue hours toward his license. he asked another friend (or hired him, i���m not sure) to serve as a copilot and make a short round trip from the olive branch airport to another in mississippi.

i was traveling in rear seat of the plane video recording the flight since this was my first flight of this nature, when on our way back from mississippi we encounter this light on the sky. nor the pilot or the copilot witnessed it. while enjoying the view from the plane, i noticed a light on the left side of the plane. at the beginning i thought that it was the sun reflecting on the pyramid (sports and events arena in memphis) but we were not even close to its location and it was not in that direction. then i noticed that the light was located a little higher than the horizon. this indicated me that it was on the sky in an altitude greater than our plane. i had the perception that the light was just floating either without moving at all or moving very slowly. unfortunately due to the high vibration of the airplane it was almost impossible to make a zoom of the object, but i tried. i was a little puzzled by the sight since i didn't know what to make out of the object, but i was positive that it was nothing that i know. i wanted to make the pilot and the copilot aware of the object, but i didn���t have a headset and the noise was too loud to speak; besides since they were talking about the flight i thought it was not safe to distract them. after a few minutes the object just disappear fading out into the sky. i'm submitting the video i capture. although i���m just submitting the part where the object appears, i have the entire recording of the flight which last 1 hour approximately.
content.summary: Flying on a small airplane i enounter a lught on the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my back patio with my husband having a smoke and letting the dogs take care of business when i looked up at the east mountains, it was dark and you couldn't really see the top of the mountains, but from experience it was towards the top where the mountains kind of come down a bit, i saw three bright lights, they would slowly and randomly take turns fading off and quickly turning back on bright, i asked my husband what the heck they were, he told me they were headlights from someone on the mountain, i told him we were to far away for them to be headlights, he then decided it was a radio tower, i then started to think well i'll check in the morning, i don't remember them ever being there before.  the next morning i didn't notice any radio towers large enough to explain the lights and then thought oh well, it was probably nothing.  the next night there was nothing, a couple night later, my husband was in bed and i went out for a smoke and they were back. i came in the house and grabbed my video camera which has really good night vision (0 lux) and i started zooming in on one (they were about the size of an eraser at the end of a standard pencil, and i almost had one zoomed in it was looking slightly oval then all of the sudden it got really bright and i almost dropped the camera, my eyes looked almost like i had been out in the sun for a while and walked inside, i couldn't see real well for about 2 minutes, then when i looked back out they were gone. the next night they were back and i had to run in the house because they looked like they were getting closer and it scared me, even when i came in i had a strange feeling like i was bein watched, it was odd! i have seen them a lot since then and they scare me!!! i will not go out back alone to smoke anymore. i see them through kitchen window though, mostly in the summer but they do show up in the winter too. i'm freaked out because i usually don't believe in this and my husband makes fun of me saying what would they want you for? i don't think they want me, but do they know i saw them? lately i have been going on the front porch which faces west, but there have been a couple times i've seen odd lights that way too, maybe i should just quit smoking (ha ha) but everyone thinks i'm crazy so i don't know who else to tell about these odd lights... i almost forgot, there had also been a few times where there were only one or two lights instead of the 3, all i know is there is something out there. there was one time the news was showing images from the helicopter they use for traffic (morning news) and there was an odd light in the sky and you could hear the news lady saying what was that, what was that light, but everyone ignored her and nothing more was ever said about it. i would like to stay annonymous because everyone thinks i'm crazy about them.
content.summary: Three lights over east mountains that happen more frequent in the summer.

content.detailedDescription:
Last october my husband and myself were driving from reno, nv to las vegas, nv at about 12am mst, we took 95 s. about 5 min. after we took the turn at tonopah, i was reclined in my chair starring out of the sunroof as i often do on road trips, my husband noticed something odd out his driver side window, (which would be to the east). i sat up to see what it was, there was an amber glowing light a few miles out, from what it looked like, hovering over some mountains but it was very dark, so it is hard to say for sure... anyway,  there was one light, then it looked like it split in to 2 amber lights! of course this could have been a trick of the eye, so now there were 2, i thought maybe it was a jet from a fighter plane or something but then they seemed to pace with us, saying in the same position in the window frame for 87 miles, they would go off and on, sometimes 1, sometimes 2, never more than 2, at about midpoint around scotty's junction, we stopped to watch at a pull off, however, while we were parked they did not light up, once we started driving again, they began to light up again. once we got to beatty there was a turn in the road and we lost sight. shortly after leaving beatty we witnessed 2 fighter jets flying fairly low and very fast directly above us heading towards the area we had seen the lights. we did not see anything on the drive back to reno, has hard as we looked. i'm not sure what this was, but i nor my husband, have ever seen anything like it before or since.
i spend a lot more time looking up nowadays.
thanks for your time,
angela 

i've attached a very bad depiction...
content.summary: Amber lights near beatty, nv

content.detailedDescription:
We where at a party ,a african party in amsterdam,the bijlmermeer,we went outside and we were  talking about this and that,then suddenly my friend said"look up in the sky!!',atfirst i could not see then he said''look in the atmosphere!!'',then i saw the ''ufo'',at a certain moment everybody was looking up,i would estemate about 15 people!,as we where looking at the ufo,it turnd 180 degrees straight up in to space,a normal "jet"could "never"go up in to the sky like that,it would break up in to hundred pieces.

when the ufo was flying athmosphere it had a orange colour at the back of the "thing",and it was pointy from the front!.
it was strange when we all said"look,look,up in the sky",several seconds later it flew straight up in space!!,it's like they heard us,seen us!.

for years i'm searching for proof!,but this event made me more confident of their existence.

idont know if you guys wil give me an e-mail back but,i'm glad that i found a place so that i could tell my story,it was short but it was fantastic.

with respect

necmettin cetin
content.summary: It was orange,and sharp in the front

content.detailedDescription:
about one year ago my son, who is 19 yrs old now and myself , i'm 50 yrs old, was in the wood behind our house around noon and we seen a pail blue ball about 30 ft away from us, we had been walking back towards our house when we suddenly stopped and turned around to look back the way we had just came through, it was about 3 ft off the ground it was sky blue and about 2 ft in diameter. it darted behind a tree that was about 25 ft to our right, we have not seen it sense that time. 
it was not an animal, i.E, squirel or turkey.It was aware of us and we seemed to have startled it by turning around quick like we did, classic wil o'wisp, we think it was some kind of extraterrestrial being or craft.
content.summary: 24in. fuzzy sky blue ball

content.detailedDescription: My parents and i were talking,i see a light out of the corner of my eye, i look at it and i was shocked.
content.summary: An extremely bright cross-like object far away.

content.detailedDescription:
Late on the night of wednesday, january 17, around 11:30 pm, i noticed a strange red light is the sky.  it was about the size of a car and was falling from the sky from east to west over 272 in the area of shiprock road.  my girlfriend and i were taking our dog out when we noticed it.  it was a reddish pinkish color with a reddish haze around the outside.  the light from the object was so bright that the pavement on the road had the red light cast on it.  it fell slowly towards the west and once it was close to the ground suddenly disappeared.  i am extremely skeptical as to what this was.  i know it was not a flair, this was far too big, high and bright but similar in color. i called wgal (news 8) right when i had seen this and reported it. then on thursday a friend who was traveling north about 2 miles from where i was on the 17th, at 11:30, had reported seeing the same mysterious light.  our stories were identical when we compared notes.  i know more people had seen the object, there were cars traveling on 272 at the time and there's no way you could miss this thing.  i would greatly appreciate if you looked into this further.  this was a large object, again about the size of a 4 door car, where ever it landed it should be visible.  it went down behind the tree line somewhere starting from the west of 272 in the shiprock road area heading towards the frogtown area.  please let me know if your hear anything more or find anything out.  it would be greatly appreciated. thank you.    
                                                                                                            sincerely,  shawn douglas
content.summary: Bright reddish pinkish  light, about the size of a four door car, slowly decending to the west

content.detailedDescription: It was dark in october. i was on my computer in my room and i looked outside because i hear a jet engine and i like watching military planes fly over me. but it wasn't a plane. i saw a few large-not very bright lights start to descend behind my house. i heard a slight hum. i ran to my dad in our work out room and told him to look outside. all we saw was an extremely bright light far far away from our house then. i was scared.
content.summary: An alien craft hovered over the lake behind my house.

content.detailedDescription: We were up high on hill overlooking lake shastina, by mt. shasta and taking photos of my fathers house that was across the lake with our camera phone.  days later when i went to review the photo's i discovered an unknown object in photo. i am trying to have the photo taken off my camera to have scanned.  i beleive if this is to be true maybe the first photo of a ufo that cannot be altered since it is on a camera phone. we have 1 close up photo and one far away photo. thanks
content.summary: Caught unknown at time on camera phone photo

content.detailedDescription: It was a giant green light on the ground,but the light was pointing up into the sky.It was off in the distance,but we could see in clearly.It looked like it was giving out green cloud.It was round, yet oval.It sort-of looked like a cone at a time. it was very bright.It left right when we stopped looking for a minute. we where quite scared at the time but we knew what we where doing.Once again i would like to state that we do have footage and many pictures of the sighting.At one time a pink light came just the same,but closer to us,then it left in a quick minute.At the time we were just watching tv in our room and it appeard. it was so bright it caught our attention very quickly.We knew right away it was a ufo.
content.shape: Circle,  Egg,  Fireball,  Oval,  Saturn-like,  Other
content.summary: It was a huge green light in the on the ground and it kept on moveing and we have actull footage and pictures of the event

content.detailedDescription: First saw object driving home from work.It was in the sky down the road ahead of me.It looked like avery big very bright star,much bigger and brighter than any i had ever seen.It imeadiatly caused me to say to myself "what the hell is that." it apeared to be stationary.I observed it for about one minute when i came to a turn onto another road.During which time the object remained stationary.After making my turn,icontinuedto go slow,so i could get a better look at it.Again its "what the hell is that." to big and bright for a stsr.I decide to pull over and have a better look.I shut the engine off and switced off the lights and got out of my car.Sure enough,its not moving.I watched it for at least a couple more minutes,during which time it remained motionless.So i decided to get back in my car and continue on my way.I started the engine and tuned on the lights and pulled back onto the road,as soon as i did ,this thing starts to move.So i continue driving but slowly,so i can watch it.It was getting closer and closer.I watched out my drivers side window.There were no other cars on the road.As it was around midnight on a dark country road.Icontinued to drive slowly,looking at the object then the road in front of me...The object,then the road in front of me.It moved around behind me so i lost sight of it for a few seconds.Then i could see it again over my other shoulder,through my passanger side window.Ithad crossed the road behind meand continued on in the same direction.I kept driving slowly until i lost sight of it over a hill.Alltogether i observed the object for what seemed like a good 41/2 to 5 minutes.At its closest it came within 3 or 4 hundred yds.From me.It was spherical and quite large,about the size of a large house or small building.There was no sound coming from it at all and it lit up the countryside as it passed over.It travled slowly,maybe 15-20 miles per hour and looked like a big ball of fire.Do'nt know what it was but it was wierd.For maybe three minutes it appeared as though it wasnt moving at all.When it finally did move after i got back in my car it moved slowly and no noise.It was maybe 4 or 5 hundred feet up in the air.Can anyone tell me what the hell that was?'
content.summary: Observed huge ball of fire 400ft. in the air moving very slowly. the size of a large house.

content.detailedDescription: I awoke this morning, thursday, jan 18, 2007.  i was very cold, and my right hand was numb.  the house was warm, thermostat at 69 degrees.  my entire right side felt so cold.  it was about half an hours before i could warm up my right side.  i felt a soreness in my left arm and found a small bruise(about 2 inches in diameter)with three very small puncture marks.  this was not there when i went to bed.  wednesday evening i was feeling very tired and went to bed early, about 9:45pm.  this is odd for normally i stay up until 11pm or midnight before i go to bed, and i always get up at 5 am.  this morning it was 6:34am when i woke.  i keep an alarm clock beside my bed, with lighted red numbers showing the time. it is now about 16 hours after i woke and the bruise has shrunk in size quite a bit, and the 3 puncture marks are almost healed.  i have taken 4 photos of the injury and will have them developed as time permits.  the camera is one i have had for about 5 years, but today when i was taking the picture of my injury, a red circle appeared in the view screen, centered on the bruise.  my camera does not have a targeting grid or crosshairs in the view finder.  i cannot explain this.  i am a mufon field investigator #10332.
content.summary: I woke this morning with a small bruise and 3 punctures marks inside my left elbow.

content.detailedDescription: It was approximately 12:30 a.M. and my husband and i were watching television. the noise began suddenly, was very loud, and was coming from something that was hovering over our house. our windows were rattling and it was if we were sitting inside an airliner that about to take off. it sounded like an airplane engine that was reving. we were terrified. it stopped after 30 seconds and jason went outside and saw nothing. he came inside and the noise started again. this time it lasted for 10 seconds, then it was abruptly gone. we were so shocked. i reported it to the police, who made a sweeping surveillance through our neighborhood. our children did not awaken. we have been interviewing our neighbors this evening and so far, at least one family also heard the noise. they live across the street from us. our home are on huge lots, so we wer relieved to hear that at least one other family "heard something." more later. thank you.
content.summary: Horrific noise above our home - house was vibrating and windows rattling-lous, as an airplena engine - suddenly began and lasted 30 seconds-suddenly stopped and began again suddenly and lasted for about 10 seconds. noise stopped abruptly.

content.detailedDescription: My husband, myself and our two daughters were driving home from my father's house on route 40 east heading east from baltimore to edgewood maryland.  right before we hit joppa town, there was an object about 100 feet up to the left of the car that i thought was an airplane.  then, i noticed it wasn't moving and it was blinking two large flood lights in the front and on the sides.  they were flashing on and off slowley.  there were numerous small blinking red lights that were blinking around the perimeter, they were blinking at a much faster rate.  it hovered there, and we were actually driving, we never saw it leave, it just got out of our view.  it made me just feel very confused.  i really thought it was a plane, so i was looking at it waiting for it to move.  my husband was seeing this also.  he is the one who pointed out to me it was not a plane.  we live very close to aberdeen proving grounds.  i'm more inclined to think it was something from the military.
content.summary: H shaped.  four big white blinking lights, many small red lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I witnessed a ufo most closely resembling a star while in a car travelling north-bound on interstate 59 in trussville, al. the object was moving north at a steady pace in a straight pattern (not curving or moving up or down). it made no sound. it's light was constant (no flashing lights).
i was approx. 13 years of age when this took place. i was in the car with my parents who did not see the object. i did not draw their attention to it (though i wish i had now). i noticed the object by casually looking up into the clear sky at the stars. when i first noticed the object i thought was an airplane but then realized it didn't have any flashing lights an airplane should have. it also appeared to have been moving slightly faster than a plane should. upon seeing the object i felt befuddled and have continued to feel that way about it ever since. i lost sight of the object when it flew over the horizon (this probably would put the object over the springville/ashville area at this point).
content.summary: Star-like ufo witnessed on i-59 trussville, al

content.detailedDescription: This sighting was one of several i have had while growing up in pensacola florida along side the navy base and on the water. this happened when i was around 10 years old. me and my mom and grandmother were driving back from visiting family along blue angel pwky. which also runs along some unused navy property that is all wooded with large pines. i was sitting in the back seat and was leaning forward inbetween the front seats of the car when i noticed what i thought was a helecopter in the distance ahead to the left of the road. being a kid i got really excited and said to mom and grandmom "look, a helecopter!" as we continued to drive we were intersecting with the flight patern of the craft. as we got closer i noticed it was no aircraft i had ever seen growing up along the base. it was a ufo. the large saucer was the size of a small house and was not flat. it was like a puff star fish, or round loaf of bread in shape. it was the same color as the night sky with a few small colored lights in no certain order around the bottom. i noticed all of the other 7 or 8 cars on the road were obviously seeing it as well because they were running off the side of the road. i asked mom to pull off to the side of the road so we could see it better but it made the line of sight blocked by being closer to the pine trees. we then pulled back onto the road were we observed the saucer moving very slowly to the right, south, over the tree line and even though the craft was moving in a staraight line it was tilted about 40 degrees almost skimming the tree tops. there were a couple other sightings i have seen also through the years. one was red balls that were the same color as a red laser and just as bright. they all flew over the road in a wooded area between milton and pensacola around 9pm and they took a 90 degree pivot turn down into the woods toward the ground. they were so fast they left streaks as they followed each other. maybe 10 to fifteen orbs. this was also witness with 2 of my best friends. the other was in a storm cloud above the beach. five lights would light up then go out in a intelligent looking pattern. then several military helicopters showed up scanning the area. there are more but i am tired of typing!
content.summary: Black puffy disk shaped ship about 500ft. long with several small lights underneth  flew slowly over the road, over our car, and then over the pine tree line going straight but the ship was tilted at an angle almost skimming the tree tops headed south

content.detailedDescription: I woke up in the middle of the night. it was i think at about 5 am and i was sick and out of school.I saw a huge light in the sky going up in a diagonal direction not really fast.I was scared and shocked. im not sure if it went out of sight or if i fell asleep again. the next night i saw it again. i think the second time could have been a dream.
content.summary: Huge yellow light in the sky i saw out of my window

content.detailedDescription:
I was at school, 12 years old. patrick henry jr high, it was pe class about 50 girls were on the playground with our 2 teachers. we'd been playing bastketball, the boys had already gone in to the showers and the girls were heading inside for the showers, somebody said, look! we all turned and saw 6 egg like things flying toward us coming from over the field that was just beyond the playground.  they were flying in formation like a triangle, like an arrow pointed toward us. going about 15 miles per hour, very slow. i'd say they were about 75 yards up. flying from the north southward. then they slowed and stopped we all had the idea that they we watching us watch them.
they were kind of egg shaped though both ends were the same shape. there were no windows, no lights, no exhaust, no noise, there was no wiggle in their movment, smooth. they were white i'd say they had a bit of a sheen to them. this was the middle of the day in a very populated area, 1 block off the main street in the town,the el camino real.They hovered for about a minute then they moved away-westerly, what had been the left point of the triangle of the formation was now the lead as they moved west in perfect formation again slowly but faster than the approach. we were all excited and a little afraid, the teachers made us go inside they also saw them. now this next part this is why ive never reported this..I also kind of remember that before they went west one went east then down into an orchard just to the east of the school. i went to the orchard after school but i don't remember anything else. i do have about 2 hours of missing time.
i came home from school late..2 hours nobody else from the school went to the orchard and i had never been there before. weird. we weren't allowed to talk about it at school, the event very stangely died away in 1 day. the kids weren't even talking about it. very weird for kids. a possible connection--- moffet field which is now nasa is just down the road--west from where this occured.
thanks for listening, lynn shannon
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 6 ufos flying in formation in the middle of the day

content.detailedDescription: I remember the time and date of this event so well because it happened on the date of the live-aid concert and i was rushing home to see led zeppelin perform. i was in my friends car and we were dropping off a friend of ours at her house. for some reason we all got out of the car when we arrived at her home and talked a bit. just as we were getting ready to return to the auto ii looked up after i had seen something out of the corner of my eye. i looked up and noticed a weird object flying from west to east in the sky. i froze in my tracks and brought it to the attention of my friend allen who was driving. he looked up and saw it too. it was hard to tell how far away it was and thus so  equaly diffacult to judge it's size. the frame of refrence that i used was the size of the 5 large white lights shaped like a v underneath the craft. one light front and center with two more on each of the lenghts that made up the v. my estimates are that the object was about 60 to 80 feet long and about 4 or 5 hundred feet in the air.
content.summary: Chevron or v shaped object with 5-7 large white lights flies over head
